item.title: FOI 2021: Tokfrans (490pts)
item.description: The goal of the task is to find a flag somewhere by following the link to http://challenges.ctf.crate.foi.se:18263. We know that it is possible to login on the page by using the credentials: acc: zeke pass: irule42. Exploring the website Upon entering the site we get prompted with a login form. When logged in the only information displayed to us is: Logged in as zeke No flags to show. By opening the cookies page it is possible to notice that the site is saving information about the user.
